This application is designed to help truck drivers find stops along a pre defined road without unnecessary manual input. \n\nStart a new route by pressing plan route in the main window. Add a destination or several. \n\nWhen the map with navigation is visible press on the screen to bring up options for rest stops. Help
This application was created as a project for the SE&M program on Gothenburg University to promote safe driving among truck drivers. This is a first year project. About
Detailed Statistics
